Introduction

Kwon Hyeop is a South Korean singer under HOWLING Entertainment. He is part of the boy group WAKER, which made its official debut on January 8, 2024, with the mini album “Mission of School”.

He rose to fame as a contestant on Produce 101 Season 2 in 2017, representing Maroo Entertainment. Despite being eliminated in the fifth episode finishing in 65th place. He also gained attention for his resemblance to BTS V.
